SELECT ROWNUM RANK, BOARD_TITLE, NOTI_TITLE TITLE, USER_NAME INS_NAME, INS_DTS, CNT VIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_ID ,(SELECT BOARD_NAME FROM BBS_BOARD_INFO WHERE NI.BOARD_ID=BOARD_ID) BOARD_TITLE ,NOTI_ID ,NOTI_TITLE ,USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') INS_DTS
,NOTI_READ_CNT CNT
,NOTI_OPN_CNT CNT
,NOTI_AGRM_CNT CNT
,NOTI_OPP_CNT CNT
,NOTI_LIKE_CNT CNT
FROM BBS_NOTI_INFO NI WHERE 1=1 AND NOTI_BGN_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND BOARD_ID IN
#{item}
AND NOTI_READ_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_READ_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,NOTI_ID DESC
AND NOTI_OPN_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_OPN_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,NOTI_ID DESC
AND NOTI_AGRM_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_AGRM_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,NOTI_ID DESC
AND NOTI_OPP_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_OPP_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,NOTI_ID DESC
AND NOTI_LIKE_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_LIKE_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,NOTI_ID DESC
)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT ROWNUM RANK, BOARD_TITLE, NOTI_TITLE TITLE, USER_NAME INS_NAME, INS_DTS, CNT VIEW_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_ID ,(SELECT BOARD_NAME FROM PBS_USER_BOARD_INFO WHERE NI.BOARD_ID=BOARD_ID) BOARD_TITLE ,USER_NOTI_SEQ ,NOTI_TITLE ,USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') INS_DTS
,NOTI_READ_CNT CNT
,NOTI_OPN_CNT CNT
,NOTI_AGRM_CNT CNT
,NOTI_OPP_CNT CNT
,NOTI_LIKE_CNT CNT
FROM PBS_USER_NOTI_INFO NI WHERE 1=1 AND NOTI_BGN_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
AND BOARD_ID = #{brdId}
AND BOARD_ID IN ( SELECT BOARD_ID FROM PBS_USER_BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_OWNR_ID = #{ownrId} )
AND NOTI_READ_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_READ_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,USER_NOTI_SEQ DESC
AND NOTI_OPN_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_OPN_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,USER_NOTI_SEQ DESC
AND NOTI_AGRM_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_AGRM_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,USER_NOTI_SEQ DESC
AND NOTI_OPP_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_OPP_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,USER_NOTI_SEQ DESC
AND NOTI_LIKE_CNT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NOTI_LIKE_CNT DESC ,TO_CHAR(NOTI_BGN_DTTM ,'YYYYMMDD') DESC ,USER_NOTI_SEQ DESC
)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT COUNT(BOARD_ID) CNT FROM PBS_USER_BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND BOARD_ID IN (SELECT BOARD_ID FROM PBS_USER_BOARD_PART_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{deptCode} AND USER_DIV = 'DPT')
AND BOARD_OWNR_ID = #{ownrId}
AND BOARD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT L.LINK_NM ,L.LINK_ADDRESS ,S.LINK_CNT FROM ( SELECT S.LNK_CODE ,COUNT(S.USR_NAME) LINK_CNT FROM USESTS S WHERE 1=1 AND GBN = #{searchCondition} AND INS_DTS BETWEEN #{sFromDt} AND #{sToDt} GROUP BY GBN ,LNK_CODE ) S ,LSI_LINK L WHERE S.LNK_CODE = (L.LINK_CAT_ID||L.LINK_CD)
AND L.END_DATE IS NULL
ORDER BY S.LINK_CNT DESC ,L.LINK_NM

SELECT BOARD_ID ,BOARD_NAME ,BOARD_KIND ,BOARD_FORM ,BOARD_FORM_SPEC ,REGR_NAME ,TOT_CNT ,READ_CNT ,REG_DTTM ,END_DTTM ,DEL_YN ,RNUM SEQ FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,B.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.BOARD_ID ,A.BOARD_NAME ,A.BOARD_KIND ,A.BOARD_FORM ,A.BOARD_FORM_SPEC ,A.REGR_NAME ,(SELECT NVL(SUM(B.TOT_COUNT) ,0) FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID ,DECODE(MAX(UP_NOTI_ID),'*' ,COUNT(UP_NOTI_ID) ,0) TOT_COUNT ,DECODE(MAX(UP_NOTI_ID),'*' ,0 ,COUNT(UP_NOTI_ID)) REPL_COUNT FROM BBS_NOTI_INFO GROUP BY BOARD_ID, UP_NOTI_ID ) B WHERE B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID) TOT_CNT ,(SELECT NVL(SUM(NOTI_READ_CNT) ,0) FROM BBS_NOTI_INFO WHERE BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID) READ_CNT ,TO_CHAR(REG_DTTM ,'YYYY.MM.DD') REG_DTTM ,A.BOARD_OPER_BGN_DTTM ,DECODE(A.BOARD_OPER_YN,'N',TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM,'YYYY.MM.DD'), '운영중') END_DTTM ,A.DEL_YN FROM BBS_BOARD_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.REG_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.BOARD_OPER_YN = 'N' AND A.UPD_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.BOARD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND A.REGR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.DEL_YN = 'Y'
) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTTM DESC
ORDER BY A.TOT_CNT
DESC
ORDER BY A.READ_CNT
DESC
ORDER BY A.REG_DTTM
DESC
ORDER BY A.END_DTTM
DESC
) B ) P
WHERE RNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM >= #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(A.BOARD_ID) FROM ( SELECT A.BOARD_ID ,A.BOARD_NAME ,A.BOARD_KIND ,A.BOARD_FORM ,A.BOARD_FORM_SPEC ,A.REGR_NAME ,(SELECT NVL(SUM(B.TOT_COUNT) ,0) FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID ,DECODE(MAX(UP_NOTI_ID),'*' ,COUNT(UP_NOTI_ID) ,0) TOT_COUNT ,DECODE(MAX(UP_NOTI_ID),'*' ,0 ,COUNT(UP_NOTI_ID)) REPL_COUNT FROM BBS_NOTI_INFO GROUP BY BOARD_ID, UP_NOTI_ID ) B WHERE B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID) TOT_CNT ,(SELECT NVL(SUM(NOTI_READ_CNT) ,0) FROM BBS_NOTI_INFO WHERE BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID) READ_CNT ,TO_CHAR(REG_DTTM ,'YYYY.MM.DD') REG_DTTM ,A.BOARD_OPER_BGN_DTTM ,A.BOARD_OPER_END_DTTM ,A.DEL_YN FROM BBS_BOARD_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.REG_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.BOARD_OPER_YN = 'N' AND A.UPD_DTTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sFromDt} ,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{sToDt} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.BOARD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND A.REGR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.DEL_YN = 'Y'
) A
